channel.title: Download link to source and client?
channel.description:
I have made a few other topic's in the past about what source and client to use, but I just gave up looking for one. Can someone give me the link to a source and client? I am a complete beginner and want to start learning Java. I will be very grateful. I am looking for a source and client for COMPLETE NOOBBY BEGINNERS ON RSPS's! :) I have looked around, but I just want proper, experienced people who know what they're on about and can give me a link to a decent source and client for noobs.
Cheers [b]--Stool[/b]

item.title: Download link to source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Why is everyone so retarded for not using an IDE

Read full topic
item.source: Download link to source and client?

item.title: Download link to source and client?
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

yo stool, you need to replace “javac” with you path to javac.exe

usually its

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe”

replace jdk1.7.0_02 with your jdk version. as for client and source

replace java with your path to java.exe by way of jdk or jre.

so its

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\java.exe”
instead of java
or
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe”

again replace jdk1.7.0_02 or jre7 with your version

Read full topic

item.title: Download link to source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Stool Stool
item.description:
@Stool wrote:

The client isn’t working :S
I compiled it, try to run it - nothing happens.
Also, when I try to compile the source, it says “Javac is not recognised as an internal or external command, operable programme or batch file”

Read full topic
item.source: Download link to source and client?

item.title: Download link to source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

First have common Java sense and learn Java by downloading an e-book.
Java Beginners E-Book

RSPS’s will not learn you Java. If you are ‘ready’ and understand the concepts of a programming language and programs in common, download Hyperion, RuneSource or Apollo as source. Don’t use Project Insanity(PI) or Delta sources, they will only give you bad programming habits. And they’re very unstable and laggy.
Azure V3 (RuneSource)

Also download a 317 deob, that’s the client.
#317 Client

Read full topic
